targets.query:
from(bucket: "currency_converter")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "exchange_rate_api")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "duration_ms")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "currency_converter")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "exchange_rate_api")
  |> group(columns: ["status"])
  |> count()
